text: George Hammond (born 1902 or 1903) was an American race car driverGeorge Hammond. Retrieved April 27, 2020. from Denver, Colorado. He won the Pikes Peak International Hill ClimbThe Pikes Peak International Hill Climb, still growing after 96 years. Retrieved April 27, 2020. in 1952PPIHC All Time Kings of the Mountain (1916-2018). Retrieved April 27, 2020., when he was part of the AAA Championship Car. His victory in the 1952 race was commented on by LIFE magazine: "On Labor Day, he swept to victory in the thrilling and dangerous Pike's Peak Climb, where a slip or a skid could mean death or serious injury, against a field of fast, experienced drivers." Hammond has a total of 8 races, between 1947 and 1955 in AAA Championship.George Hammond. Retrieved April 27, 2020.1952 AAA season.
